entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:04PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...An Active Weather Pattern Returns to Southeast Alaska... The sunny and dry weather ends as an upper low develops over the Gulf midweek. Multiple surface lows are expected track towards the Panhandle during this time starting Tuesday night and continuing through the weekend. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...BE ALERT TO SLICK SPOTS OVERNIGHT... Temperatures at or just below freezing overnight combined with moisture on roads may lead to a few slick spots. entry.title: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 12:28PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Park County about 12 miles southwest of Cody. The minor flooding caused by an ice jam is impacting areas from the 6Qs road Bridge near StageTrail road, south to just north of the junction of the 6Qs road and Southfork road.
